Author: TheCarbdashian
Text: I personally only nearly drown myself getting anxiety swallowing liquids and my throat muscles just kinda stop working, but I know how it is to also do what you did. Do you have a netti-pot or whatever it's called? I heard those work wonders for if vomit is lodged in the cavity. I've tried it with a simple paper funnel before, though, and it worked pretty good.
